2. Gitelman Syndrome
3. Liddle Syndrome
4. Hyperaldosteronism (Primary or Secondary)
5. Renal Tubular Acidosis (RTA) - Distal or Proximal

10. Sjögren's Syndrome with Tubulointerstitial Nephritis and Renal Salt-wasting Syndrome
